channel.title: HATEOAS on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in HATEOAS on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Tic-Tac-Toe with F#, Azure Functions, HATEOAS and Property-Based Testing
item.description: This post describes a toy application that I’ve built with F# and Azure Functions in about 1 day of work. It shows a simple end-to-end implementation with some useful techniques applied, and can be used as a reference point for anyone interested in one of the topics mentioned in the title.
